DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether body composition associate high risk mortality subject ≥ 65 year .
DOC.brief_title: Body Composition : Predictor Mortality Subjects Over 65 Years
DOC.detailed_description: Study centre : University Hospitals Geneva Study type : retrospective study Study duration ( anticipate ) : 1 year collection data ( 1.10.2011-1.12.2012 ) 3 month statistical analysis writing , lead completion study march 2013 Study hypothesis : A low fat-free mass ( FFM ) high fat mass ( FM ) associate high risk mortality subject ≥ 65 year . Aims : The primary objective evaluate relationship body composition mortality men woman ≥ 65 year , take account co-morbidities . The secondary objective compare relationship ) relationship body mass index ( BMI ) mortality , b ) relationship body composition change mortality , c ) healthy subject subgroups patient chronic disease Methods : Included subject measurement body composition bioelectrical impedance analysis , perform HUG 1990 december 2011 . Excluded subject live abroad . Body composition measurement retrieve DPI 4D precede use DPI nutrition presently use research . Diseases specific laboratory value time body composition measurement retrieve simultaneously . Mortality retrieve population register death . Statistics : The relationship body composition mortality , total population subgroup patient chronic disease , evaluate Cox regression , adjust age , gender co-morbidities . The variance mortality ( adjust R2 ) relate FFM compare related BMI FFM loss .
DOC.criteria: All subject ≥ 65 year include previous study body composition bioelectrical impedance analysis perform Nutrition Unit since 1990 December 2011 . All patient ≥ 65 year measurement body composition bioelectrical impedance analysis perform clinical routine Nutrition Unit dietitians University Hospital Geneva since 1990 December 2011 , hospitalize .
